<span class="citation" data-cites="babel/plugin-transform-computed-properties">@babel/plugin-transform-computed-properties</span>
=================================================================================================================================

> Compile ES2015 computed properties to ES5

See our website <span class="citation" data-cites="babel/plugin-transform-computed-properties">\[@babel/plugin-transform-computed-properties\]</span>(https://babeljs.io/docs/en/babel-plugin-transform-computed-properties) for more information.

Install
-------

Using npm:

    npm install --save-dev @babel/plugin-transform-computed-properties

or using yarn:

    yarn add @babel/plugin-transform-computed-properties --dev
